channel.description: Recent content in tech on daiyi

item.title: a smol zine about clojure
item.description: Summer 2018 was a dream. me & saskia were writing open source under the auspices of rgsoc & the clojure community, which gave me a home in berlin <3 (zine format is not simple to print or read. to recieve a copy, you can email/message me and I’ll send you a physically assembled one.) Here’s a preview of the cover:

item.title: Observability for Developers
item.description: I illustrated an ebook about implementing observability. You can download it here (:
